reviewText: if you are a fan of reba then you need to own her tv show. this shows her abilately to act in a comedy. it show how she can be funny at one moment and serious another moment. it is worth the money to buy the six seasons of reba. i wish that it would have cont' for a another season. it is fun to see the younger actor grow up on the show.

The Reba show is so well put together with a great ensemble and script that it is worth seeing many times. It is funny and heartwarming and a boost to morale in a world full of troubles. It's a classic in the situation comedy genre.

This item came very quickly as promised (Thank you Amazon Prime), No damage from shipping. I would order from this seller again. I would recommend getting Amazon Prime if you order very often at all. It has saved me a lot in shipping/handling, and I have it with-in a couple days. Thanks Amazon

This Reba series 1-6 is fantastic.  I just love Reba.  It is so hillarious.  The dvd's have great sound and picture quality.  And the price was very, very reasonable.  I highly recomend this series set.

One of my favorite television shows! I love the quirky characters, but also that it tackles some tough topics (divorce, teen pregnancy, growing up, etc.) with a sense of love and optimism without hiding from the reality of how difficult they can be on a family sometimes. I particularly like the development of the relationship between the ex-wife and the new wife.

I am not at all pleased with this set, I love the Reba show but this box set was a complete waste of my time and money. Please be advised that the discs are double sided the first set I received was all scratched up...several discs from several seasons. After contacting amazon they sent out a replacement right away but I was very disappointed to find that the replacement seemed to be in worse condition than the one I had already sent back. I really wanted the show and for fear of sending it back again and still not getting a good set I just paid to have the discs that didn't play fixed the best they could but there's still 3 discs that skip and some episodes I can't watch. The show deserves 5 ***** but not the discs themselves. Double sided discs are horrible!
well the item came in on time, and although it is a Christmas gift and will not know the quality of the movies, I am sure it will be great because they are sealed.

This is my all time favorite TV program.  I have watched each episode at least 20 times, and I enjoy it as much on the 20th time, as I did the first time.  This is a great clean family program.  I am so sad that this program is no longer on, other than reruns.  I really love this program.

This is the entire Reba Collection. It didn't go past 6 seasons, and even the 6th season was cut short (about half the episodes of the other seasons).

If you've watched Reba, I can't tell you anything new.

If you haven't you should give it a try. Each episode with its own little problem carefully packaged and solved for you.  Fun characters. You will laugh. Maybe cry.

Cons: Characters making the same mistakes repeatedly in different episodes. Barbara Jean. Don't think too much about what's happening to the little ones - I think they're left in the attic 95% of the time.
This is a reat show.  The DVD's are wonderful quality, and the delivery was fast.  I recommend this product to anyone who loves the show.

My son and daughter had enjoyed a Season 4 DVD while visiting friends last summer and again this summer.  We decided to look for the DVDs of REBA at our local movie rental place.  When they didn't have them, we searched Amazon.  My son has been through every episode, many more than once.  It is a pleasure hearing him laugh as he enjoys these DVDs.  We will enjoy them for many years.
This whole series is fantastic. The way they all get along is a great family entertainment, especially in todays times!

I received the DVDs before the estimated date and programmed my DVD player to play multi-region as the DVDs are in region 1 and I am in Australia (region 4). Once the DVD player was unlocked the DVDs worked perfectly, so glad I can buy from amazon.com because I LOVE this TV show and it's not released in Australia.

I watched this shoow when it first aired but for some unknown reason lost interest after awhile. I didn't see it again after that until they started releasing seasons on DVD. My favorite chactor is Cheyene. The whole cast keeps you laughing eor all six seasons which I now have. So will you if you get it.

The product is very good. Reba is an amazing and funny show and it is worth the money. It was well packaged too (which is rare for me when buying on Amazon).

However I live in the UK, and have had a problem when it finally arrived at my post office. I received a letter form the post office telling me that I had to pay customs for the product because it was over $100 (the postage cost made it over $100). I then also had to pay Royal Mail as well! This was not explained when I bought the product. I also found it ironic how it was the cost of the postage to the UK which made the items big enough for Royal Mail & Customs to charge me for it. For some unknown reason the product also shipped from America - Germany - Uk (No idea why!)

Other then that complaint it is a wonderful product and I am enjoying watching it. Reba & Melissa are hilarious together!
Very very fast shipping. Chose to buy this new bundle because it was a much better deal and it was free shipping.
Buying this set of seasons 1 through 6 is more expensive than buying each season individually... that's ridiculous. What kind of sense does that make?

i hate that this show is no longer on t.v. because it to me was the best sitcom on. it was funny and interesting i loved all the actors. if you haven't seen it then you need to watch it and you will love it almost as much as me so get it.

I think this show is (was) fantastic. It make me laugh a lot. In my case, it is so closed to my real life,when it comes to the divorce part. Exception: I do not know how she can handle BArbra Jean. Also, when you look at the family arguments, they are so closed to real family life. Like I say, it was a fantastic show. Love it.

This is a hilarious sitcom. The plot features Reba, a divorced mom with three kids, who has to put up with them, her son-in-law, ex-husband, and his new wife,  Barbara-Jean, the big blonde ditz. They get into all sorts of crazy situations, usually involving family fights, but sometimes wandering into the truly bizarre (they even managed a tasteful comedy about Hurricane Katrina). The dialogue is witty, the actors have perfect timing, and the plots are entertaining. Barbara-Jean, steals most of the shows, but all of the characters have their moments. If you want to laugh, I highly recommend renting this.

Outstanding quality dvd's at a fantastic price. Compared to other sites. Now I can watch Reba whenever I want. Overall great price. Each season packaged seperately. Some of the dvd's are double sided. But who cares as long as they work. I would recommend amazon.com to anyone I know.
All 6 seasons arrived quickly and in great condition.  I would definitely recommend this seller!

An Absolute Delight!!

"Reba" is an excellent show with a very talented lead, Reba McEntire, and ensemble.  The laughs are for real--and if you are a parent like me, the humor is CLEAN.  There's no reason to have to "edit" any scenes.  The story lines are up-to-date and sometimes even a little heart-catching (ie., "No Good Deed").  Well worth every bit of my investment in the series.....

I was so excited to watch this. I hadn't seen the whole show yet so I was happy to buy the entire series at a good price. However, I'm only on season 2 so far and already I've seen multiple DVDs that lag... it makes me so angry and frustrated to know that I spent money on a show I am enjoying but can't because I have to get up every 5 minutes to take the DVD out and try to clean it (& it STILL lags!!!) I'm disappointed and angry at the quality of the DVDs I was given. The fact that I'm only 2 seasons in and it's lagged more than once makes me angry that it might occur for the rest of the DVDs. So disappointed.
